creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: single loop silver torque; center of torque has a sun with the yin/yang symbol on it; torque is completely symmetrical in design; each side depicts a fox, bat, rooster and lion; silver loop wraps around itself at the ends where a fish is depicted; connector wrapped in thin wire with cone in middle
title: Torque
